post:
Hi guys!

We're now available in Oslo and Vienna.

The plans are available on hosthatch.com/ssd-vps and the network and other information at hosthatch.com/features

As a launch offer, we'll be doubling the credit that you add to your account between $25 and $75 (i,e you get $150 for paying $75). **This credit can only be used in Oslo and Vienna and cannot be combined with any other promotions.**

The promotion runs till the end of 16th October EDT.
